title: Game crashing when going on discord (Cant reconnect)
body:
Hey! My game is crashing everytime i take a look at my discord. And the worst part, i cant find any way to reconnect.

At the beginnig it says it cant connect to the internet, when i retry about 4 times its just loading and refuses to reconnect. My ping is 38 all time, but it refuses to reconnect. 

If someone has a solution please write it below...

replies.body: Is that *only* happening when you alt+tab to discord? If the game is working normally without switching back and forth I would simply try not to do that as much or at all. Over all though, I would try using ethernet for a more stable connection as well as adjusting a few [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get a better link.

I think that was the case :)

i should stop alt+tab
Thanks for the help :D
